analysis.description:
Crowdsale.hasBalance (/unique_chucks/22/0x006b4425ba57148466c0c54af1c484348a14a8a4.sol#589-600) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- allocatedIndex[_beneficiary].length > 0 && _releaseDate == allocatedIndex[_beneficiary][allocated[_beneficiary][_releaseDate].index]

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.endCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/22/0x006b4425ba57148466c0c54af1c484348a14a8a4.sol#753-784):
	External calls:
	- ! token.unlock() (/unique_chucks/22/0x006b4425ba57148466c0c54af1c484348a14a8a4.sol#762-763)
	- totalTokenSupply = token.totalSupply() + allocatedTokens (/unique_chucks/22/0x006b4425ba57148466c0c54af1c484348a14a8a4.sol#765-766)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allocatedTokens (/unique_chucks/22/0x006b4425ba57148466c0c54af1c484348a14a8a4.sol#772-775)

NUCrowdsale.retreiveTokens (/unique_chucks/22/0x006b4425ba57148466c0c54af1c484348a14a8a4.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenInstance.transfer(beneficiary,tokenBalance) (/unique_chucks/22/0x006b4425ba57148466c0c54af1c484348a14a8a4.sol)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.endCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/22/0x006b4425ba57148466c0c54af1c484348a14a8a4.sol#753-784):
	External calls:
	- ! token.unlock() (/unique_chucks/22/0x006b4425ba57148466c0c54af1c484348a14a8a4.sol#762-763)
	- totalTokenSupply = token.totalSupply() + allocatedTokens (/unique_chucks/22/0x006b4425ba57148466c0c54af1c484348a14a8a4.sol#765-766)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allocated (/unique_chucks/22/0x006b4425ba57148466c0c54af1c484348a14a8a4.sol#772-775)
	- allocated (/unique_chucks/22/0x006b4425ba57148466c0c54af1c484348a14a8a4.sol#781-784)
	- allocatedEth (/unique_chucks/22/0x006b4425ba57148466c0c54af1c484348a14a8a4.sol#781-784)
	- allocatedIndex (/unique_chucks/22/0x006b4425ba57148466c0c54af1c484348a14a8a4.sol#772-775)
	- allocatedIndex (/unique_chucks/22/0x006b4425ba57148466c0c54af1c484348a14a8a4.sol#781-784)
